data.tweet: Spurs hit just one shot on target, compared with two from Eint Frankfurt. This season Spurs have averaged 2.7 shots on target per 90 minutes.

data.tweet: Tottenham completed 93 long balls (38 for Eint Frankfurt) and 38 passes into the final third (Eint Frankfurt completed 15).

Eint Frankfurt completed 38 long balls, Tottenham carried the ball into the final third an impressive 6 times.

data.tweet: Spurs were also good in the air, winning 20 aerial duels (74%) to Frankfurt's seven. In their last game (against Arsenal) Spurs won six aerial duels.
Eric Dier, our man of the match, attempted 104 passes, completing 96 (more than anyone else on the pitch).
